question: How to enroll in a course?
answer: From the courses, choose a course you want to enroll. Then click on it's SEE DETAILS button to go to the course details page. From the course details page click GET PREMIUM ACCESS. If you are already logged in, it will take you to the checkout page. If you are not logged in, it will navigate you to the login page. After login you will be navigated to the checkout page. Click the BUY NOW button to enroll to the course.
